version_description:
Garmin Connect Mobile 3.22
Create your own running and cycling routes conveniently with round-trip routing using the all-new Course Creator tool.
Make custom workouts easily with the Create a Workout feature. Existing workouts can also be edited or deleted.
New activity types allow you to track yoga and floor climbing.
Support for new Garmin devices

Garmin Connect Mobile 3.22
Create your own running and cycling routes conveniently with round-trip routing using the all-new Course Creator tool.
Make custom workouts easily with the Create a Workout feature. Existing workouts can also be edited or deleted.
New activity types allow you to track yoga and floor climbing.
Support for new Garmin devices

Garmin Connect Mobile 3.22
• Create your own running and cycling routes conveniently with round-trip routing using the all-new Course Creator tool.
• Make custom workouts easily with the Create a Workout feature. Existing workouts can also be edited or deleted.
• New activity types allow you to track yoga and floor climbing.
• Support for new Garmin devices

Garmin Connect Mobile 3.22
• Create your own running and cycling routes conveniently with round-trip routing using the all-new Course Creator tool.
• Make custom workouts easily with the Create a Workout feature. Existing workouts can also be edited or deleted.
• New activity types allow you to track yoga and floor climbing.
• Support for new Garmin devices

Garmin Connect Mobile 3.22
• Create your own running and cycling routes conveniently with round-trip routing using the all-new Course Creator tool.
• Make custom workouts easily with the Create a Workout feature. Existing workouts can also be edited or deleted.
• New activity types allow you to track yoga and floor climbing.
• Support for new Garmin devices

Redesigned My Day page gives you a colorful, customized view of the day’s (and week’s) health and fitness data.
Make your activities more exciting with added photos.
New profile page makes it easier to access your recent activities, personal records and statistics.
Support for new Garmin devices and features.

重新设计的“我的一天”页面为您打造了丰富多彩的自定义视图，方便您查看每天（每周）的健康和健身数据。
添加照片，让您的活动更加精彩。
“新配置文件”页面帮助您更轻松地访问您的最近活动、个人记录和统计数据。
支持全新 Garmin 设备及功能。
Garmin Connect 正在不断努力改善您的体验，并帮助您取得进步。 我们会每月发布新功能和应用程序更新。

Garmin Connect 4.6 is the last version of the app that will support iOS 9. To ensure the best experience, please make sure your phone’s software is up to date in Settings.

· El seguimiento del ciclo menstrual ayuda a las mujeres a saber más sobre la fase actual del ciclo, los síntomas y el bienestar general.
